# Electrical Storm (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Electricity Spells|electricity]]]

**Level:** [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 15th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 15]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a small copper key)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Area:** Cylinder (20-ft. radius, 40 ft. high)

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude half

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Dragonlance Campaign Setting (WotC), pg. 105

Crackling bolts of electricity arc through the spell's area, dealing 4d6 electricity damage to all creatures within (Fort save half). A creature that fails on its Fortitude save is [[Dazed|dazed]] for 1 round.

Any creature that enters the spell 's area is subject to its effects as soon as it sets foot in the *electricity storm.* In addition, on your tum in each following round. any creature currently in the *electricity storm* takes damage and must save again as described above.
